problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum operations (copy all, paste) to get exactly n 'A's.
problem_summary_technical: The minimum operations correspond to the sum of prime factors of n.
key_insights: To reach 'n' characters, we must have arrived from a state 'n/p' where 'p' is the number of characters copied.
The operations are essentially building 'n' by multiplying prime factors.
Each prime factor 'p' corresponds to 'p' paste operations after one copy operation.
